item.title: Michael Bublé - Someday
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Someday on the ukulele by Michael Bublé and Meghan Trainor. The chords used are G C D Am Em7 plus an optional Uke 2 part that uses A B Cm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Sway
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm.
As performed by Michael Bublé.
The original shifts up a half step at the end...this version stays in Dm. This is a great song to play/sing!
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Jingle Bells
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F
As performed by Michael Bublé and the Puppini Sisters
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LLiRxOpKWcg
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Haven't Met You Yet
item.description:
As performed by Michael Bublé.
Chords for song: C Dm Em F G Am Bm7(which is a substitution for Bm) and Gbm(F#m) which only occurs twice.
Lots of chord changes!
I do not own the copyright to this music. Video intended for educational purposes.
